DOC.brief_summary: A study to determine whether a new formulation of methylprednisolone suspension is bioequivalent to methylprednisolone tablets.
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Comparing Methylprednisolone Suspension To Methylprednisolone Tablets
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or female subjects between the ages of 21 and 55 years. Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m2 and a total body weight > 45 kg (99 lbs). Any condition possibly affecting drug absorption (eg, gastrectomy). A positive urine drug screen
